Kanji Sensei

Discover the beauty of Japanese Kanji as you browse the web with our powerful extension. 
Seamlessly replacing English and French words on web pages, our extension focuses on JLPT N5 vocabulary, helping you deepen your understanding of Kanji characters.

Please note that this extension performs word matching based on a simple algorithm, without considering contextual relevance. 
Its primary goal is to aid in Kanji memorization rather than providing accurate translations of words or sentences.

Also, this extension can be disabled on a domain basis, allowing you to exclude specific websites from the word replacement process.

Exciting potential future improvements include:

- Expansion to include JLPT N4 vocabulary
- Enhanced verb matching capabilities, enabling more accurate replacements of verbs in different contexts.
- Implementation of number matching
- Support for additional languages (feel free to comment which one you would like to see next!)
- Miscellaneous updates, including user-requested features and general enhancements to improve your overall experience.

Begin your journey into the captivating world of Kanji today with our web extension, and stay tuned for future updates that will enrich your language learning adventure!
